programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas finds a wounded man, takes him to the North Fork doctor, and gives blood to help save the stranger's life. Marshal Torrance won't help as he says he knows the man and wants him dead. Things become more complicated when vigilantes ride to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Coming home from school, Mark stumbles upon a dead man's body. Lucas discovers he was stabbed and the only clue is a belt with the initials R.M. Lucas leaves Mark with Artemus Quarles, a cousin who is visiting. Quarles, however, is not who he seems.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne travels to Mexico to deliver freight. He soon becomes entangled in a murder plot, and the brutal leader of the French troops forces Cheyenne to stand against him. Mexican rebels, including an old foe, rescue him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Newly deputized, Cheyenne brings law and order to a small town after the murder of its sheriff. Once there, he uses an old stage trick from the play "Hamlet" to bring a corrupt businessman to justice for murder.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law's company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.sub-title: All for One or One for Himself
programme.desc: Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley's father. However, Bubba's reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.sub-title: The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town
programme.desc: On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: With only half of the contestants left, the competition intensifies when the cowboys realize their every move could lead to their elimination. A female competitor continues to make an impression on the contestants and judges. An individual medley race brings everyone's competitive nature to the surface as some of them get creative to get ahead. In the end, a cowboy is awarded the immunity belt buckle for the second time. A contestant's expertise as a cow boss is called into question during the team cattle weight challenge, leaving his reputation on the line. Two more cowboys hit the trail after a shocking elimination that no one saw coming.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Jimmy reunites with Brad, an old friend and rival from his youth. They soon discover that Clara, the daughter of a man who was their mentor, is missing. In actuality, she ran away after finding out about her father's corruption.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas finds a wounded man, takes him to the North Fork doctor, and gives blood to help save the stranger's life. Marshal Torrance won't help as he says he knows the man and wants him dead. Things become more complicated when vigilantes ride to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Coming home from school, Mark stumbles upon a dead man's body. Lucas discovers he was stabbed and the only clue is a belt with the initials R.M. Lucas leaves Mark with Artemus Quarles, a cousin who is visiting. Quarles, however, is not who he seems.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Cheyenne travels to Mexico to deliver freight. He soon becomes entangled in a murder plot, and the brutal leader of the French troops forces Cheyenne to stand against him. Mexican rebels, including an old foe, rescue him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: Newly deputized, Cheyenne brings law and order to a small town after the murder of its sheriff. Once there, he uses an old stage trick from the play "Hamlet" to bring a corrupt businessman to justice for murder.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger and Cody struggle to pen two bulls in need of a veterinary check-up. Cody gets soaked when he fails to heed Booger's prediction of a rainstorm, sparking Booger to try his hand at delivering the local weather forecast. Bubba decides to accept the job with his father-in-law in Mississippi and he makes a handmade gift for Cody and Booger to soften the blow when he breaks the news to them. The trio takes on one last big job to benefit a neighbor in need. Bubba and Kaley host a final cookout before they pack up and leave for Mississippi.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's time for the cowboys to ride into new pastures as they explore growing their cattle business in unexpected ways. Bubba has been making good money working for his father-in-law's company in Mississippi, but he realizes he'd rather be out of his office chair and back on his horse in Alabama. Cody is excited to be managing a big rodeo, but a steer mishap puts the future of his contract on the ropes. And, even though Booger has happily saddled up with Jaclyn, it's unfamiliar terrain for him when she starts adding a woman's touch to his bachelor pad. As the three cowboys get together to sort yearlings for a friend, they devise a plan for making BBQ sauce to expand their cooking skills and company.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When two ex-Confederate officers come to town, trouble ensues for Lucas as he was a lieutenant in the 8th Indiana which defeated the 12th Cavalry 15 years ago. The beaten men were sent to a Union prison camp and now want revenge on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Traveling salesman Speed Sullivan, and his son, Swifty, come to North Fork selling lightning rods. Sullivan makes a call at Vashti Croxton's home where he finds her unconscious. When she blames Sullivan for the assault, Lucas must intervene.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.sub-title: Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch
programme.desc: When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.sub-title: William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist
programme.desc: Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: With only four cowboys left, Trace raises the stakes by taking away the chance to win immunity from elimination. At this point, one mistake can cost any of them the competition. A series of challenges test the remaining contestants on their mastery of essential cowboy skills: horsemanship, roping, and cattle handling. One of the top competitors delivers less-than-perfect results for the first time and misses the mark during a steer-roping challenge. When tending to the cattle, two of the contestants' lack of experience comes to light, putting the health of the herd at risk. One of the competitors uses his experience as a cow boss and takes control of the group challenge. The other cowboys question his direction, unsure if his tactics will be successful. Trace makes a tough decision and sends someone packing.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Van Dorn, a corrupt businessman and the man responsible for the murder of Marshal Sam Cain's wife, comes to Sweetwater. First, he ousts Cain and takes over the town, and then he appoints his gang to be the law enforcement for the town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.
